fields.name: Perks:
fields.value:
Aperture Science Portal Gun: (Pay $50 to activate) Teleport to any unoccupied corner space on the board.
Employ: Pay $50 to another player. They will collect rent for you this turn.
Efficiency: Rent is tripled.
Insurance: **Aperture Science Portal Gun** and **Employ** are free to use. You pay 25% less rent than usual.

Perks cost $200 each and may be bought in any order.
